name: Vehicle
description:
Welcome to Vehicle, world's most addicting and rage-inducing game. Your goal is to complete levels that are made to test your knowledge and reflexes. Compete with your friends and people around the globe to get the fastest times!

Supports SteamVR: Both the Firstperson and Thirdperson modes can be controlled with any VR headset (works with The Rift, The Vive and HDK2!).

Both Firstperson aswell as Thirdperson are supported, you can switch between cameras at all times by pressing tab.
